short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple chrome extension to purge 45's name from your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Most of us are just sick of seeing his name everywhere online. If you're feeling triggered after all these years, let this chrome extension purge his name and replace it with "45" for you.
